ARGUMENT

|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | zzngim.y | |- Y = ( Z/nZ ` 0 ) |

| 3 |  | #P_0nn0 | |- 0 e. NN0 |
| 4 | 1 | #P_zncrng | |- ( 0 e. NN0 -> Y e. CRing ) |
| 5 |  | #P_crngring | |- ( Y e. CRing -> Y e. Ring ) |

| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_mp2b | |- L e. ( ZZring GrpHom Y ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` Y ) = ( Base ` Y ) |

| 12 | 3, 11 | #P_ax-mp | |- L : ZZ -onto-> ( Base ` Y ) |
| 13 |  | #P_fofn | |- ( L : ZZ -onto-> ( Base ` Y ) -> L Fn ZZ ) |

| 15 | 12, 13, 14 | #P_mp2b | |- ( L |` ZZ ) = L |

| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- 0 = 0 |
| 19 | 18 | #P_iftruei | |- if ( 0 = 0 , ZZ , ( 0 ..^ 0 ) ) = ZZ |
| 20 | 19 | #P_eqcomi | |- ZZ = if ( 0 = 0 , ZZ , ( 0 ..^ 0 ) ) |
| 21 | 1, 10, 17, 20 | #P_znf1o | |- ( 0 e. NN0 -> L : ZZ -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` Y ) ) |

| 23 |  | #P_zringbas | |- ZZ = ( Base ` ZZring ) |
| 24 | 23, 10 | #P_isgim | |- ( L e. ( ZZring GrpIso Y ) <-> ( L e. ( ZZring GrpHom Y ) /\ L : ZZ -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` Y ) ) ) |
| 25 | 9, 22, 24 | #P_mpbir2an | |- L e. ( ZZring GrpIso Y ) |
